categories.name: Running & Endurance
categories.description: Aerobic capacity, pacing, and running efficiency for Hyrox 8km and GAA match endurance

skills.name: Aerobic Capacity
skills.description: Ability to sustain prolonged aerobic effort (VO2max, endurance base)
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles with continuous 10+ minute efforts
skills.level2Descriptor: Can sustain moderate effort for 20-30 minutes
skills.level3Descriptor: Can sustain effort for 40-60 minutes at steady pace
skills.level4Descriptor: Maintains high work rate for 60+ minutes with minimal decline
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional endurance, can sustain near-maximal effort for extended periods

skills.name: Running Economy
skills.description: Efficiency of running gait, energy cost per km
skills.level1Descriptor: Inefficient gait, high energy cost, poor mechanics
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing technique, some wasted movement
skills.level3Descriptor: Competent running mechanics, adequate efficiency
skills.level4Descriptor: Efficient gait, minimal wasted energy, good form under fatigue
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional running economy, maintains perfect form throughout

skills.name: Pacing Strategy
skills.description: Ability to manage effort distribution across race/match duration
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor pacing, starts too fast or too slow, inconsistent
skills.level2Descriptor: Basic pacing awareness, significant variation in splits
skills.level3Descriptor: Can maintain relatively consistent pace in training
skills.level4Descriptor: Good pace judgment, minimal variation, adapts to conditions
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional pacing control, optimal energy distribution, competitive awareness

skills.name: Recovery Between Efforts
skills.description: Ability to recover between high-intensity bouts (Hyrox stations, GAA surges)
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow recovery, struggles to resume activity quickly
skills.level2Descriptor: Moderate recovery, needs extended rest between efforts
skills.level3Descriptor: Can recover within 60-90 seconds for next bout
skills.level4Descriptor: Fast recovery, ready for next effort within 30-60 seconds
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional recovery, minimal performance drop between bouts

categories.name: Power & Strength
categories.description: Functional strength for sled work, carries, and GAA-specific power (tackling, jumping, striking)

skills.name: Lower Body Strength
skills.description: Leg strength for sled push/pull, lunges, jumping (squat, lunge strength)
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles with bodyweight movements, poor leg strength
skills.level2Descriptor: Can perform basic leg exercises with light load
skills.level3Descriptor: Can squat/lunge with moderate load (0.75-1x bodyweight)
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong lower body, can handle 1-1.5x bodyweight with good form
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional leg strength, 1.5-2x+ bodyweight, explosive power

skills.name: Upper Body Strength
skills.description: Upper body strength for farmers carry, wall balls, rowing, skierg
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles with pushups, limited upper body capacity
skills.level2Descriptor: Can perform basic upper body exercises with light load
skills.level3Descriptor: Can perform pushups/pulls with moderate load
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong upper body, good pressing/pulling strength
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional upper body strength and endurance

skills.name: Grip Strength
skills.description: Grip endurance for farmers carry, sled pull, GAA ball handling
skills.level1Descriptor: Weak grip, cannot sustain carries or hangs
skills.level2Descriptor: Basic grip strength, fatigues quickly under load
skills.level3Descriptor: Can sustain moderate grip demands for 30-60 seconds
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong grip, can sustain heavy carries/hangs for 60+ seconds
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional grip strength and endurance, no limiting factor

skills.name: Explosive Power
skills.description: Rate of force production - jumping, sprinting, striking, tackling
skills.level1Descriptor: Limited explosiveness, slow force development
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing power, moderate jump height/sprint acceleration
skills.level3Descriptor: Good power output, competent jumping and acceleration
skills.level4Descriptor: High power output, impressive explosiveness
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional explosiveness, elite jump/sprint/strike power

skills.name: Strength Endurance
skills.description: Ability to maintain strength output under fatigue (wall balls, repeated efforts)
skills.level1Descriptor: Strength deteriorates rapidly with repetition
skills.level2Descriptor: Can maintain moderate output for 10-15 reps
skills.level3Descriptor: Can sustain strength for 20-30 reps with minor decline
skills.level4Descriptor: Maintains high output for 30-50+ reps
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional strength endurance, minimal decline over 50+ reps

categories.name: Core & Stability
categories.description: Core strength, balance, and stability for injury prevention and performance

skills.name: Core Strength
skills.description: Anti-extension, anti-rotation, anti-lateral flexion strength
skills.level1Descriptor: Weak core, cannot hold basic plank positions
skills.level2Descriptor: Can hold plank for 30-60 seconds with moderate form
skills.level3Descriptor: Can hold planks/carries 60-90 seconds with good form
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong core, can maintain stability under load/fatigue
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional core strength, perfect stability in all movements

skills.name: Balance & Stability
skills.description: Single-leg balance, dynamic stability, proprioception
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor balance, struggles on single leg
skills.level2Descriptor: Can balance on single leg for 10-20 seconds
skills.level3Descriptor: Good static balance, developing dynamic stability
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong balance, stable in dynamic movements
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional balance and proprioception in all conditions

skills.name: Hip Stability
skills.description: Glute strength, single-leg control, pelvic stability
skills.level1Descriptor: Weak hips, knee valgus, poor single-leg control
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing hip strength, some compensation patterns
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate hip stability for basic movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong hips, good control in running/jumping/cutting
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional hip stability, perfect movement patterns

skills.name: Postural Control
skills.description: Ability to maintain neutral spine and optimal posture under load
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor posture, excessive spinal flexion/extension
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing postural awareness, loses position under load
skills.level3Descriptor: Can maintain good posture in most movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Excellent postural control, maintains position under fatigue
skills.level5Descriptor: Perfect postural control in all conditions and loads

categories.name: Speed & Agility
categories.description: Sprint speed, acceleration, change of direction, and reactive agility for GAA

skills.name: Sprint Speed (Max Velocity)
skills.description: Top-end running speed (20-40m flying sprint)
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow sprinter, limited top speed
skills.level2Descriptor: Below average sprint speed for age/level
skills.level3Descriptor: Average sprint speed, adequate for level
skills.level4Descriptor: Fast sprinter, above average speed
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional sprint speed, elite velocity

skills.name: Acceleration (0-10m)
skills.description: First step quickness, acceleration out of static position
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow acceleration, poor first step
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing acceleration, below average start
skills.level3Descriptor: Good acceleration, adequate for level
skills.level4Descriptor: Fast acceleration, explosive first 5-10m
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional acceleration, elite starting speed

skills.name: Change of Direction
skills.description: Ability to decelerate, cut, and re-accelerate (pre-planned)
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow direction changes, poor deceleration mechanics
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing COD, loses speed through cuts
skills.level3Descriptor: Can change direction adequately, some speed loss
skills.level4Descriptor: Fast COD, maintains speed through cuts
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional COD, minimal speed loss, explosive out of cuts

skills.name: Reactive Agility
skills.description: Ability to react and change direction based on stimulus (GAA-specific)
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow reactions, struggles with unpredictable movements
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing reactive ability, delayed responses
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate reactions, can respond to simple stimuli
skills.level4Descriptor: Fast reactions, responds well to complex stimuli
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional reactive agility, elite anticipation and response

skills.name: Repeated Sprint Ability
skills.description: Ability to maintain sprint performance across multiple bouts
skills.level1Descriptor: Significant speed decline after 2-3 sprints
skills.level2Descriptor: Moderate decline after 4-5 sprints
skills.level3Descriptor: Can maintain 80-85% speed for 6-8 sprints
skills.level4Descriptor: Maintains 85-90% speed for 8-10 sprints
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional RSA, maintains 90%+ speed for 10+ sprints

categories.name: Hyrox Stations
categories.description: Technique and efficiency for the 8 Hyrox competition stations

skills.name: SkiErg Technique (1000m)
skills.description: Efficiency and power on SkiErg, pacing for 1000m effort
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor technique, inefficient stroke, very slow pace
skills.level2Descriptor: Basic technique, developing efficiency, slow pace
skills.level3Descriptor: Competent technique, can complete 1000m at steady pace
skills.level4Descriptor: Efficient technique, strong power output, good pace
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional technique and power, elite SkiErg performance

skills.name: Sled Push (50m)
skills.description: Leg drive and body position for 50m sled push
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles to move sled, poor mechanics
skills.level2Descriptor: Can push sled slowly with coaching cues
skills.level3Descriptor: Can complete 50m push with good pace and form
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong push, fast pace, excellent body position
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional power and speed on sled push

skills.name: Sled Pull (50m)
skills.description: Arm-over-arm rope pull technique for 50m
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles with pulling motion, very slow
skills.level2Descriptor: Can complete pull with poor efficiency
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate pulling technique, steady pace
skills.level4Descriptor: Efficient pull, strong grip, fast pace
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional pulling power and efficiency

skills.name: Burpee Broad Jumps (80m)
skills.description: Efficient burpee technique combined with maximal broad jumps
skills.level1Descriptor: Slow burpees, short jumps, poor efficiency
skills.level2Descriptor: Can complete movement but very fatiguing
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate technique, can maintain pace for 80m
skills.level4Descriptor: Efficient burpees, good jump distance, strong pace
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional efficiency and power, minimal fatigue

skills.name: Rowing (1000m)
skills.description: Rowing technique and pacing for 1000m effort
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor rowing form, very slow, inefficient
skills.level2Descriptor: Basic rowing technique, developing power
skills.level3Descriptor: Competent rowing, can maintain steady 1000m pace
skills.level4Descriptor: Efficient technique, strong power, good pace
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional rowing technique and power output

skills.name: Farmers Carry (200m)
skills.description: Posture, grip endurance, and walking efficiency with heavy kettlebells
skills.level1Descriptor: Cannot complete carry, drops weights multiple times
skills.level2Descriptor: Can complete with many stops, poor posture
skills.level3Descriptor: Can complete 200m with 1-2 stops, adequate posture
skills.level4Descriptor: Strong carry, minimal stops, good posture and pace
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional carry, no stops, perfect posture, fast pace

skills.name: Sandbag Lunges (100m)
skills.description: Lunge technique and endurance with sandbag for 100m
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor lunge form, cannot complete distance
skills.level2Descriptor: Can complete with poor form, many stops
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate lunge technique, can complete 100m steadily
skills.level4Descriptor: Good form, strong lunges, minimal stops
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional lunge technique and endurance

skills.name: Wall Balls (100 reps)
skills.description: Squat depth, timing, and endurance for 100 wall ball shots
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor squat depth, cannot maintain rhythm
skills.level2Descriptor: Basic technique, breaks into many small sets
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate form, can complete 100 with several breaks
skills.level4Descriptor: Good form, strong sets, efficient pacing
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional technique, large unbroken sets, fast completion

categories.name: Movement Quality
categories.description: Fundamental movement patterns, mobility, and technique

skills.name: Squat Pattern
skills.description: Bodyweight squat mechanics - depth, knee tracking, spine position
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor squat mechanics, limited depth, knee valgus
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing squat, some compensation patterns
skills.level3Descriptor: Competent squat to parallel with good alignment
skills.level4Descriptor: Excellent squat mechanics, full depth, perfect form
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional squat pattern, role model movement quality

skills.name: Hip Hinge Pattern
skills.description: Deadlift/hinge mechanics - neutral spine, hip drive
skills.level1Descriptor: Poor hinge, excessive spinal flexion, quad-dominant
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing hinge awareness, some lumbar rounding
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate hinge, can maintain neutral spine with light load
skills.level4Descriptor: Excellent hinge mechanics under load
skills.level5Descriptor: Perfect hinge pattern, optimal hip drive and spinal position

skills.name: Shoulder Mobility
skills.description: Overhead range of motion, shoulder flexion and rotation
skills.level1Descriptor: Limited overhead mobility, restricted shoulder movement
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing mobility, can reach overhead with compensation
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate shoulder mobility for basic movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Good shoulder mobility, full overhead range
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional shoulder mobility and control

skills.name: Thoracic Mobility
skills.description: Mid-back extension and rotation capacity
skills.level1Descriptor: Very stiff thoracic spine, limited rotation/extension
skills.level2Descriptor: Limited thoracic mobility, compensates with lumbar spine
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate thoracic mobility for basic movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Good thoracic extension and rotation
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional thoracic mobility and control

skills.name: Ankle Mobility
skills.description: Dorsiflexion range for squatting, lunging, running
skills.level1Descriptor: Severely limited ankle dorsiflexion
skills.level2Descriptor: Restricted ankle mobility, compensates with heel lift
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate ankle mobility for most movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Good ankle dorsiflexion, no movement limitations
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional ankle mobility and control

skills.name: Movement Coordination
skills.description: Ability to learn and perform complex movement sequences
skills.level1Descriptor: Struggles with basic coordination, clumsy movements
skills.level2Descriptor: Developing coordination, learns movements slowly
skills.level3Descriptor: Adequate coordination, can learn standard movements
skills.level4Descriptor: Good coordination, learns complex movements quickly
skills.level5Descriptor: Exceptional coordination and body awareness
